edu.rit.numeric

Class NormalFit

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.numeric.NormalFit

  • public class NormalFit
extends Object
    Class NormalFit fits a series of data points to a normal distribution. The null hypothesis is that the data points are drawn from a normal distribution N(μ,σ) with unknown mean μ and unknown standard deviation σ. The values of μ and σ are fitted so as to minimize the maximum absolute difference between the cumulative distribution of the data points and the cumulative distribution of N(μ,σ). A Kolmogorov-Smirnov (K-S) test is performed to determine the p-value of the null hypothesis with the fitted μ and σ parameters.

    To do the fitting procedure, call the static NormalFit.fit(Series) or the static NormalFit.fit(double[]) method, passing in the data points. The method returns an instance of class NormalFit whose fields contain the fitting procedure's results.

    • Method Detail

      • fit

        public static NormalFit fit(Series data)
        Fit the data in the given series to a normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        data - Data series.
        Returns:
        A NormalFit object containing the fitting procedure's results.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is empty.

      • fit

        public static NormalFit fit(double[] data)
        Fit the data in the given array to a normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        data - Data array.
        Returns:
        A NormalFit object containing the fitting procedure's results.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is zero length.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Unit test main program. Generates N random data points from a normal distribution with mean μ and standard deviation σ, then fits the data to a normal distribution.

        Usage: java edu.rit.numeric.NormalFit seed N mu sigma
